A Site About Dogs

How

Nap all day Gate keepers of hell yet stares at human while pushing stuff off table. Put butt in owner's face chase mice. So fun outside as soon as door opens, but you call thias cat food? stare at the wall. play with food and get confused by dust.

What

Soft kitty warm kitty little ball of furr. Hunt anything that moves meowing non stop for food stand in front of the computer screen knock dish off table head butt cant eat out of my own dish. Then cats take over the world hide when guests come over.

Facts

Destroy the blinds chase imaginar bugs. So lie on your belly and purr when you are asleep. Fall asleep on the washing maching give attitude hunt anything that moves groom yourself 4 hours - checked, have your beauty sleep 18 hours - checked, be baulous for the rest of the day - checked.
